title: Version 2.0.70-2.0.74 Release Series
description: Claude Code released multiple updates December 16-19, 2025 including v2.0.70 with 13 CLI changes (Enter key for prompt suggestions, auto-update toggle for plugins, plan_mode_required option), v2.0.71-2.0.74 with LSP tool for code intelligence (go-to-definition, find references, hover documentation), and stability improvements. Claude Code also reached $1B milestone with Anthropic's Bun acquisition announced December 3.

title: Claude Opus 4.5 Now Generally Available
description: Claude Opus 4.5 is now generally available in GitHub Copilot for Enterprise, Business, Pro, and Pro+ users. Previously in public preview since November 24, no longer requires promotional 1x premium multiplier. Available across VS Code and Visual Studio.

title: Agent Skills Support Added
description: GitHub Copilot now supports Agent Skills, enhancing the capabilities of GitHub Copilot's agent mode for more advanced agentic workflows.

title: Free Tier Model Selection Fix
description: Fixed model selection issue affecting free tier customers using Gemini Code Assist releases 2.56 and later. Fixed in version 2.63.1 on December 12, 2025.

title: v3 API Updates
description: December 1, 2025: v3 API Updates including enterprise and organization-level Notes and Playbooks management routers. The October 2025 v3 API launch featured RBAC support, service user authentication, and audit logging.
